summary.overallFindings: Performance Food Group Company demonstrates limited public evidence of responsible AI practices, with most references focused on general sustainability, operational automation, and cybersecurity rather than AI-specific governance or ethical frameworks. No sources provide concrete AI transparency, explainability, or bias mitigation details. The company has yet to disclose formal AI governance, human oversight, or external audit commitments related to AI, indicating early-stage or private AI governance practices.
